title: Mock a Database Service
description: Create a UserRepository that uses a mock database to test CRUD operations without a real database connection.
instructions: Complete the test suite by creating mock implementations for the database methods. The UserRepository depends on a database object with findById, create, update, and delete methods. Mock these methods to return appropriate test data and verify the repository calls them correctly.

hints.text: Use mock().mockResolvedValue() to create mock async methods that return promises
Each mock method should be configured to return appropriate test data for the scenario
